body:
<!--StartFragment-->

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i1ZlKdl5o38/W0mPsbWAPeI/AAAAAAAABqc/A6dcVmE3JVUT5lqUeKoINjUUF02K9y5UQCLcBGAs/s320/IMG-20180712-WA0003.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i1ZlKdl5o38/W0mPsbWAPeI/AAAAAAAABqc/A6dcVmE3JVUT5lqUeKoINjUUF02K9y5UQCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20180712-WA0003.jpg)

\
The gospel industry is fast growing, and we can only be grateful for those trying their best to enforce this growth.\
\
In that light, get to know more about one of Cameroon's gospel sensation.\
\
"My name is Rochie Osvalin Janwie. Am a Songwriter, Praise and worship leader , life coach and above all a Lover and servant of Jesus Christ.\
\
I equally serve as Marketing and Sales Manager for Cassvita Cameroon. I enjoy reading, learning, serving, and movies."\
\
Furthermore, his music is backed by a power force of inspiration.

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CRtOZHK2brs/W0mPy1xxiHI/AAAAAAAABqg/BxfjUHjLOycW0pcofgdRGlIhp8PZcUdNwCLcBGAs/s320/IMG-20180712-WA0004.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CRtOZHK2brs/W0mPy1xxiHI/AAAAAAAABqg/BxfjUHjLOycW0pcofgdRGlIhp8PZcUdNwCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20180712-WA0004.jpg)

\
\
"The Word and Spirit of God is the underlying inspiration behind the songs I write. Irrespective of the theme God's word is the final measuring rod for my songs.\
\
In his career, he has released a series of albums and singles . Although the ride just begun for him, he has never resented efforts to work hard .\
\
Song Titles :\
\
• Great and mighty..2009\
• Siliwe...2013\
• As we Wait...2016\
• Predestinated... 2018.

[![](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O_YAPdlF8ro/W0mP95b1iEI/AAAAAAAABqo/KUrTVnA41oIGjZQJp7oOdt_jXHJO0gmfQCLcBGAs/s320/IMG-20180712-WA0005.jpg)](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O_YAPdlF8ro/W0mP95b1iEI/AAAAAAAABqo/KUrTVnA41oIGjZQJp7oOdt_jXHJO0gmfQCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20180712-WA0005.jpg)\
\
Albums.\
\
• One day be one day..2009\
• 2010...Covenant Child.\
• 2013..Big Big God\
• 2018...Predestinated.\
The ride has not been easy but so far, success has been recorded .\
\
"I feel my success has been on a B grade level if am to rate it. First because our nation as a whole is still growing to relate to gospel music from within as compared to without. Equally I feel the response to my music is getting more acceptance as the content matures. Its promising.\
\
He looks up to so many great people for mentorship\
\
"I've got a wide range of Mentors and Models including Marvel JOKS, Chris Morgan, Marvin Sapp,Micah Stampley,Joe Praise and Sinach to name but a few.I equally follow Tamella Mann,Jonathan Nelson and Dr Tumi."\
\
\
![](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zcDbAtQ7Oes/W0mQF8BfgWI/AAAAAAAABqw/TeXRnmspRZo2edHg1VxZAD3GfIVK4AQxQCEwYBhgL/s320/IMG-20180712-WA0002.jpg)\
\
Nonetheless, as a gospel artists who has gone out there, seen , experienced and conquered, he sends a piece of advice to his other colleagues.\
\
"Believe God as if you don't work hard.Work hard as if everyone else doubts what you're doing"\
\
Lastly , get his songs on youtube : Rochie Osvalin

[![](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0SxYYK9KSRw/W0mQoCiCe1I/AAAAAAAABrA/CMaQLp9GxOIWcfnbh9di5kdJWD5IJy6dwCLcBGAs/s320/IMG-20180712-WA0006.jpg)](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0SxYYK9KSRw/W0mQoCiCe1I/AAAAAAAABrA/CMaQLp9GxOIWcfnbh9di5kdJWD5IJy6dwCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20180712-WA0006.jpg)



<!--EndFragment-->

label: Worship Nation
